article_title: Chelsea Clinton stumps for Hillary Clinton at Converse College
article_text:
Clinton was the featured guest at a Women for Hillary event at Converse College

Chelsea said her mother, as president, would expand the foundation President Obama has laid

article_metadata.title: Chelsea Clinton stumps for Hillary Clinton at Converse College | The State

og.description: With three weeks to go before the South Carolina Democratic primary, Chelsea Clinton came to Spartanburg to stump for her mother.
